lenders.name: Westlake Financial Services
lenders.notes: Sheet shows no max PTI/Income/Amount Financed/Vehicle age or mileage caps; rates shown 7.99%-23.99% and 6.99%-19.90% / 4.99%-19.90%; max LTV up to 150%.

lenders.name: Exeter Finance (Base)
lenders.notes: Min income $1,700 (single source). Vehicles up to 13 yrs / 200k miles. PTI shown 15%-21%.

lenders.name: Exeter Finance (ExeterPLUS)
lenders.notes: PLUS program shows 620+ and rates as low as 9.95%.

lenders.name: Global Lending Services (GLS)
lenders.notes: Min income $1,800. PTI up to 24%. Amount financed $7,000-$55,000. Max LTV 135%. Term up to 78 months per sheet; mileage/term matrix exists.
